data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nAplgWjzc9QQ7kNvgFSSIkn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYASUvZw6ipJ4elVyhzUWJnpkk1XXWhDihY2SIRzNjuYzQ&oe=668A7C9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jaHD675jBzQQ7kNvgHJoqRX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCZ-Vu0s_m6NZMLinLcgwV8qG_o0YPbQuXSZX0crOVOWA&oe=668A8624)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bGhXWv9VjVoQ7kNvgFmcdw-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBAqK713OxTMLBAnv0bh_7P3y15jL8q8r7zLFGl5ZiFww&oe=668A6D87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Q-EBMQrmNhcQ7kNvgGbYNqm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDhqcZXWFtmNdw4lwpPTTE7t6O0Up_h1DotFEuum_Ek1g&oe=668A6066)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZlT1wcqN8rAQ7kNvgGmT2Y4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCRsf9jVQc3yBxP9YEyWvIqrnR3HJ_BABTnWlTvtvQjgA&oe=668A8CD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7ZfohNu4hPIQ7kNvgHvuBX-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBdhVPFMzl_aITUPI6MmC3V46dCx62ZkvpC3l83A08dVg&oe=668A8959)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vhJFf2Q1nxEQ7kNvgHfVe6g&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDMa4Kj4RZqW0TmBtiQuTcoaBjUCofC-3l0ZtUE57eyCg&oe=668A6F70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5EGyfu3ZXKIQ7kNvgFup61q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCrlQ5NnP-JJPGT5IeYlONGjXdzr9oysEqqn_lAhwHanQ&oe=668A59EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8DEIOoxMnGYQ7kNvgHTyX6t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDPEl5Wy-x0Dh0l-8yi7BnKMaPFBRlE02wjZARwLx7y-A&oe=668A6D97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=74tNMjelv3sQ7kNvgERGQTY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCb7Jhy-Q9V6bmNIOonBCElbtXTTu8EduYtxceU_fOnrQ&oe=668A890C)
